main_definition: in close proximity to a specific location or object, often within a short distance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Close in physical space or geography
meanings_and_examples.example: There is a park nearby where I can walk my dog.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In close temporal proximity to an event or occurrence
meanings_and_examples.example: The restaurant offered free drinks for the guests who arrived nearby during their happy hour.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Within easy access, often used when referring to services or amenities
meanings_and_examples.example: There are several coffee shops nearby where I can work on my laptop.
These two products are by the same company, so they're quite nearby each other in terms of features and price.
